Posted By: miilkshake (6/2/2012 12:56:06 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I think homeboy here might be slightly under-rated. Not particularly viable for super-fast-burn decks IMHO, but quite useful in mid-game red decks. This guy is a viable drop turn 1, that isn't completely worthless if you pull him later on in the game. It should be noted that the two-at-once Firebreathing effect this guy offers is better than the sum of its parts - you're much more likely to be able to pay to able to pump an unblocked attacker when you have the option of *which* guy to pump. With that of course comes the increased susceptibility to removal, but the Pairing mechanic doesn't punish players too harshly by leaving the possibility of re-pairing available.  
  
On the whole, he's pretty solid. I just don't see this guy as barely scraping in above the 3 star rating he has now; I see him as arbitrarily close but unequal (less than) to 4. Plus, great art :D
posts.html:

With that of course comes the increased susceptibility to removal, but the Pairing mechanic doesn't punish players too harshly by leaving the possibility of re-pairing available.

On the whole, he's pretty solid. I just don't see this guy as barely scraping in above the 3 star rating he has now; I see him as arbitrarily close but unequal (less than) to 4. Plus, great art :D
